程序包 android.car.app

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    CarSystemUIProxy
    A blueprint for the system ui proxy which is meant to host all the system ui interaction that is required by other apps.
    CarTaskViewControllerCallback
    Callback interface required to monitor the lifecycle of CarTaskViewController.
    CarTaskViewControllerHostLifecycle.CarTaskViewControllerHostLifecycleObserver
    An interface for observing the lifecycle of the container (host).
    CarTaskViewHost
    This is a blueprint to implement the host part of CarTaskViewClient.
    ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewCallback
    A callback interface for ControlledRemoteCarTaskView.
    RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewCallback
    A callback interface for RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskView.
    RemoteCarRootTaskViewCallback
    A callback interface for ControlledRemoteCarTaskView.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CarActivityManager
    API to manage android.app.Activity in Car.
    CarTaskViewClient
    Represents the client part of the task view as seen by the server.
    CarTaskViewController
    This class is used for creating task views & is created on a per activity basis.
    CarTaskViewControllerHostLifecycle
    This class represents a handle to the lifecycle of the host (container) that creates the CarTaskViewController.
    CarTaskViewControllerHostLifecycleFactory
    A factory to create instances of the CarTaskViewControllerHostLifecycle.
    ControlledRemoteCarTaskView
    A ControlledRemoteCarTaskView should be used when the launch intent of the task is known before hand.
    ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig
    This class provides the required configuration to create a ControlledRemoteCarTaskView.
    ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig.Builder
    A builder class for ControlledRemoteCarTaskViewConfig.
    RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskView
    A RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskView can act as a default app container.
    RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewConfig
    This class provides the required configuration to create a RemoteCarRootTaskView.
    RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewConfig.Builder
    A builder class for RemoteCarDefaultRootTaskViewConfig.
    RemoteCarRootTaskView
    A RemoteCarRootTaskView should be used when a given list of activities are required to appear inside the bounds of a the given android.view.View in the form of a task stack.
    RemoteCarRootTaskViewConfig
    This class provides the required configuration to create a RemoteCarRootTaskView.
    RemoteCarRootTaskViewConfig.Builder
    A builder class for RemoteCarRootTaskViewConfig.
    RemoteCarTaskView
    A SurfaceView that can embed a Task inside of it.
  • 注释类型概要 
    注释类型 说明
    CarActivityManager.ResultTypeEnum
